title: Docker Master Build
description: Prerequisites: this lab will need the master build of Docker, which is available on Play with Docker.

meta.title: Mastering Docker: Exploring Multi-Stage Builds
meta.description: Dive into the latest Docker feature - multi-stage builds, and learn how to build a small, efficient Golang application image.
